page.title: 18Our Health
page.content: Our health service is run by the Suffolk Health Authority we are in the East Suffolk Area. The DoctorÂ£s pratice in Saxmundham has 4 doctors, two full time district nurses, 1 part time, 1 health visitor and a midwife. The clinic has an X-ray unit a chiropodist and a physiotherapist.There is a new Doctors Surgery in Saxmundham it was opened in 1985.Mrs Payne the senior Nurse came to tell us about her job.She sees twenty to twenty five people a day,she changes dressings,gives injections and takes stitchesout.She works 7 days a week and has every other weekend off.
